description.narrative: To improve planning and management of the Recipient's sanitation sector as well as toprovide access to sanitation services through pilot approaches in selected areas.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Sc. I. A.2 | Description :Recipient has recruited a monitoring and evaluations specialist; for theproject implementation unit with MINEE. | Due Date :30-Jun-2012
